attributes.action: bring immediate legislation to limit the pay of bosses of state aided banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of big bonuses for those who have presided over the biggest banking crisis since the thirties is abhorrent.
We, the people of Britain, should expect that no-one in the banking sector will be earning large sums this year.  They certainly do not deserve it, especially as they have paid themselves such large sums in previous years.
Maybe set a similar limit to Obama, say half a million pounds maximum total remuneration (even this is too much).  If they don't like it, are they really going to get another job after such poor performance?
Let them feel lucky they still have a job, unlike many people who now don't!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
